question: The 2018 World Rangers Day (WRD) is observed on which date?
explanation: The World Rangers Day (WRD) is celebrated every year on July 31  to remember and appreciate the crucial services rendered by rangers who protect, conserve and preserve the biodiversity of our forests at the cost of their lives. The day also commemorates all the selfless men and women who lost their lives protecting defenseless animals against human greed in the line of duty.
